description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 'Shoot lots of things then die'  Super Killer Hornet is a new vertical shooter with a twist. Answer equations as you dodge the horde of ever increasing enemies and bullets to maximise your score in this Japanese inspired SHMUP
